title: Konojel
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Fast food, Mexican, Guatemalan, Salvadorian, Central American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Comedor serving inexpensive typical Guatemalan/Central American breakfast and lunch. Has a vegan plate and most items can easily be veganized. Offers pupusas, sandwiches and burritos. Almost everything is vegetarian. Usually serves a daily special and staff is open to special wishes - just ask. Also sells different local food products. The comedor is part of an NGO working to combat malnutrition and poverty in Guatemala and profits from the comedor are used to support this type of work. The Konojel Community Center also hosts regular fundraising events that are advertised in the comedor.
streetAddress: Main path of San Marcos below basketball court
